p: During the outbreak, 18 (12.8%) cases of HAV were detected along with three cases of coinfection of HAV with HEV. Similarly, a lower prevalence of HAV (20%) in hospitalized cases was documented by from Madhya Pradesh,[ 19] Punjab,[ 17 18] and Chhattisgarh.[ 6] The decreasing trend of HAV in these studies supports the shift in seroprevalence of HAV reflecting improved living standard and environmental hygiene.[ 20]
